original_title: Joyce Carol Oates: A Body in the Service of Mind
overview: Prolific writer Joyce Carol Oates has remained intensely private. Until now. Through a long-standing friendship, and persistent inquiry, director Stig Bjorkman is granted unprecedented access to document her mornings of longhand writing, her walks with her husbandâ€”to visit her within her solitude.
title: Joyce Carol Oates: A Body in the Service of Mind
